Summary: Something Big was above my home!
trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There was one other sighting in Chicago on or around October 18th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsOn October 18th around 1 and 2 am there was something hovering a very loud noise above my home. It was no helicopter because after the noise there were helicopter I believe looking for this object. But for 5 to 10 minutes, it hovered a high pressured-like noise. Very strange. I strongly believe there has been UFO active around this area as I and my father saw couple of objects going by very high in the sky at night on Thursday and on Friday we saw a bright orange glow object. That could be a planet, but looks very close. I hope other have heard or seen something similar. Great experience!
